common.smtpNotReady: The mail server is not ready for this operation, please check the configuration.

auth.loginSubheader: You can log in using your password or request an OTP via email.
auth.loginError: An error occurred during the login process.
auth.registerSubheader: Please create the first admin account to continue.
auth.needAdminWarning: Currently, there are no users in the system. Please register a user first. That account will be an administrator.
auth.needAdminWarningLink: Click here to start the process!
auth.noNeedAdminWarning: The system already has users. Please log in with the admin account and invite members.
auth.name: Name
auth.requestedOTP: If your email address is in the system, you will receive an OTP shortly.

validator.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validator.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validator.passwordSpaces: Password cannot begin or end with a blank space
validator.passwordComplexity: Password must contain a combination of letters and at least one number or symbol
